General.Name: AB Zemaitijos pienas
General.Description: AB Zemaitijos pienas produces and sells dairy products in Lithuania and internationally. The company's products include fermented cheese, pre-packaged cheese, processed cheese, cream, cream cheese, butter, dairy and mixed spreads, milk fats, pasteurized cream, buttermilk, whey, and dried milk products. It also offers fresh dairy products, such as milk, cream, curd, yogurts, desserts, curd cheese, glazed curd cheese, and fermented dairy products. In addition, the company engages in the rental, transportation, storage, and maintenance of milk purchasing points, as well as provides other services. It offers its products under the D"iugas, Magija, Saulute, Germantas, Rambyno, Dobilas, PIK-NIK, "emaitijos, Tiche, and Milk Powder brand names. The company was founded in 1924 and is based in Tel"iai, Lithuania.
